page.title: 10Shopping and Golf -Sandwich
page.content: A survey was carried out by pupils from the Junior School by interviewing their parents.Many parents believed that the local shops were inadequate for their shopping needs and they shopped outside the town in Deal or Ramsgate.The town was further criticised for its lack of facilities for teenage children.In contrast some of the childrens' parents were appreciative of the library service and the Youth Club. *************************************** A notable feature of Sandwich is its proximity to four excellent Golf Courses,two of which are well known in International Golf circles.These are the Prince's Golf Club and the Royal St. George's at Sandwich Bay where the Golf Open Tournament will be held this year and roughly 250,000 visitors are expected in the week.
